title: MUMBLE_ADD_VOICE_TARGET_PLAYER
content:
0x32C5355A// MumbleAddVoiceTargetPlayer
void MUMBLE_ADD_VOICE_TARGET_PLAYER(int targetId, Player player);Parameters:targetId: A Mumble voice target ID, ranging from 1..30 (inclusive).player: A game player index.Adds the specified player to the target list for the specified Mumble voice target ID.
codeBlocks:
// MumbleAddVoiceTargetPlayer
void MUMBLE_ADD_VOICE_TARGET_PLAYER(int targetId, Player player);

local player = PlayerId()
-- Example usage for MUMBLE_ADD_VOICE_TARGET_PLAYER
MumbleAddVoiceTargetPlayer(0, player)
